timeline.message:
Added Reference Links

These reference links in the document helps in redirecting to the different pages. Instead of searching each section.

timeline.bodyText:

            * Longer https://camel.apache.org/manual/latest/book-getting-started.html[Getting Started Guide]

timeline.author: zregvart
timeline.diffHunk:

 Then come back here and you might want to read the following

-* Longer Getting Started Guide

timeline.author: zregvart
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -8,10 +8,10 @@ Building it yourself.
 Then come back here and you might want to read the following
 documentation before continuing:
 
-* Longer Getting Started Guide
+* Longer https://camel.apache.org/manual/latest/book-getting-started.html[Getting Started Guide]
 * Find out about xref:enterprise-integration-patterns.adoc[Enterprise Integration Patterns]
   and how to implement them with Camel
-* Review the Architecture guide to see how to build Routes using the xref:java-dsl.adoc[Java DSL]
+* Review the https://camel.apache.org/manual/latest/architecture.html[Architecture guide] to see how to build Routes using the xref:java-dsl.adoc[Java DSL]
